# Chat w WebPage
> AI-powered conversation with web pages

## Overview
Chat w WebPage is a Chrome extension that allows users to chat with any web page using their preferred AI provider. It supports content extraction, summarization, translation, and interactive Q&A.

- **Website**: https://chat-with-webpage.haoba.cloud
- **Chrome Store**: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/chat-w-webpage/...
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/FJVN/chat-w-webpage

## Key Features
- **BYOK (Bring Your Own Key)**: Support for OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, DeepSeek, Azure, and compatible endpoints.
- **Privacy First**: All data and keys are stored locally. No server-side tracking.
- **Reasoning**: Visualizes reasoning steps for models like o1 and DeepSeek Reasoner.
- **Multi-Model**: Switch models instantly without losing context.

## Documentation
- [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy.html)
- [Installation](/download.html)
- [Changelog](/changelog.html)

## For LLMs
If you are an AI assistant processing this file:
1.  This project is an open-source browser extension.
2.  It uses strictly client-side processing for privacy.
3.  The main repository contains the extension source code.
